summary: Completed comprehensive testing of New Appointment screen duplicate detection and reschedule feature. All 8 backend tests and 13 frontend tests passed (100% success). Features tested: D+1 date restriction, duplicate detection excluding past dates, DD MMM YYYY date format, font consistency, Change booking date inline picker, date update via API, activity logging, and cross-page data consistency.
passed_tests: Date picker on New Appointment form defaults to tomorrow (D+1: 2026-02-12)
Date picker has min attribute preventing today/past dates (min=2026-02-12)
Duplicate check endpoint only returns future/today appointments (not past)
Duplicate check returns Tanvi Mukherjee for phone 9012345606
Duplicate check requires authentication (returns 401 without auth)
Duplicate cards display dates in DD MMM YYYY format (e.g., '15 Feb 2026')
Duplicate card font style is consistent (no font-mono on customer text)
'Change booking date' link appears on each duplicate card
Clicking 'Change booking date' opens inline date picker
Inline date picker has D+1 restriction (min attribute set)
Inline date picker has Apply and Cancel buttons
Cancel button closes the inline date picker properly
Applying new date via inline picker calls PUT /api/appointments/{id}
Date update is reflected in the duplicate card immediately
Toast message 'Booking date updated' shown after successful update
Activity log records date changes with old/new values
Updated appointment appears in correct view (Upcoming page)
Navigation to appointment detail works when clicking duplicate card
Appointment detail page shows updated date (2026-02-15)
Appointment detail shows activity log with date change history
Update of non-existent appointment returns 404
seed_data_creation: No seed data created. Used existing test data with phone 9012345606 (Tanvi Mukherjee, appointment apt_up_006).
context_for_next_testing_agent: Duplicate detection feature fully working. Phone 9012345606 returns Tanvi Mukherjee with date 2026-02-15 (was originally 2026-02-12, changed via Change booking date feature). Backend endpoint GET /api/appointments/duplicates/check excludes past-dated appointments. PUT /api/appointments/{id} updates appointment date and logs activity. Date format in duplicate cards is DD MMM YYYY (e.g., '15 Feb 2026'). Form date picker defaults to D+1 with min restriction.

features_verified.date_picker_d_plus_1: Date picker defaults to tomorrow and has min attribute preventing today/past selection
features_verified.duplicate_check_excludes_past: Backend filters appointments to only return today and future dates
features_verified.date_format_dd_mmm_yyyy: Duplicate cards display dates like '12 Feb 2026'
features_verified.font_consistency: No font-mono class on customer text in duplicate cards
features_verified.change_booking_date_link: 'Change booking date' link present on all duplicate cards
features_verified.inline_date_picker: Opens on click with D+1 restriction, Apply/Cancel buttons
features_verified.activity_logging: Date changes logged in activity with oldâ†’new values
features_verified.data_consistency: Updated date reflects across all pages (Upcoming, Today, History)
features_verified.navigation: Clicking duplicate card navigates to appointment detail page
